TopicTitle: I/ITSEC 2014 - Where is the KSP Exibit

Articles.Content:
I am currently at the I/Itsec event in orlando as I write, and I've noticed something or someone was missing...

Where's Squad? This would be a great place to demonstrate your project because it is simulation based! I figure it would be another great place to expand your presence!

You guys are probably busy working on your masterpeice.

Point is, I miss you guys. Hahaha
